Events that occurred on 13 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1883 - The composer Richard Wagner dies.
1908 - Voice actor Patrick Barr is born.
1923 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 6.
1944 - John Tolkien is made an Exorcist and Acolyte in a ceremony at Stonyhurst.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 228a.
1971 - Rachel Tolkien is born.
1979 - The Tolkien Quiz Book by Andrews and Zuber is published.
2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The Ashen Wastes" is released in North America.
2021 - The Tolkien Society Seminar is held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
